categoryBlurb: We are excited to include these gorgeous pieces from Luma Diamonds Consultants in our GiftStarter family. Jean Luma, one of the leading diamond industry connoisseurs, has been designing and creating custom jewelry since 2001. With such a variety of beautiful pieces, there is sure to be a perfect one for the deserving individual in your life. Weddings, anniversaries, graduations, retirements -- a gift from Luma Diamonds is sure to leave them speechless!
categoryMetaDescription: We are excited to include these gorgeous pieces from Luma Diamonds Consultants in our GiftStarter family. Jean Luma, one of the leading diamond industry connoisseurs, has been designing and creating custom jewelry since 2001. With such a variety of beautiful pieces, there is sure to be a perfect one for the deserving individual in your life. Weddings, anniversaries, graduations, retirements -- a gift from Luma Diamonds is sure to leave them speechless!

productList.productDescription:
The Classic Lines of this timeless Ivy Leaf is adorned by Natural Diamonds, Pearls, and one uniquely placed Emerald set in 14k Rose, White or Yellow Gold.


Total Diamond Weight: 1.50ct. (minimum)


20 matching Pearls and 1 Natural Emerald


Metal: Gold 14k


Measurement: Length=1.61 inches and Width= 1.57 inches.


Included in the package price: Matching link 1.5mm to 2.00mm chain in 16’ or 18’, mahogany wood storage case, detailed appraisal, and cleaning cloth.

The smaller version to the Original Ivy Centennial Pendant-Brooch. Classic Lines of this timeless Ivy Leaf is adorned by Natural Diamonds, Pearls, and one uniquely placed Emerald set in 14k Rose, White or Yellow Gold.


Total Diamond Weight: .50ct. (minimum)


20 matching Pearls and 1 Natural Emerald


Metal: Gold 14k


Measurement: Length=1.08 inches and Width= 0.98 inches.


Included in the package price: Matching link 1.5mm to 2.00mm chain in 16’ or 18’, mahogany wood storage case, detailed appraisal, and cleaning cloth.

Sleek and Elegant Ivy Outline Design with Natural GH/SI1 hand selected diamonds set in your color choice of 14k gold.


Total Diamond Weight: 1.20ct.


Metal: Gold 14k: White, Yellow, or Rose Gold.


Measurements: Length= 1.25 x Width= 1.20inches.


Included in the package price: Matching link 1.5mm to 2.00mm chain in 16’ or 18’, mahogany wood storage case, detailed appraisal, and cleaning cloth.

Classic Delta Symbol with 22 Natural Gemstones Options – Diamonds (G/H-SI1) and/or Natural Diamond Cut Rubies. The open back design allows for light to enter each of the gemstones for superior brilliance. Set in your choice of 14k Yellow, Rose, or white Gold.

















Weight0.2 kg
Dimensions30 x 20 x 30 cm
Metal Color

Platinum, Rose Gold, White Gold, or Yellow Gold
